    • getPortfolioStructure

      public java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ViewPortfolioClassSubtreeDto>> getPortfolioStructure​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Description copied from interface: IPortfolioQueryService
      Gets the portfolio structure for given the portfolio id and the enterprise name

      Structure:

       Portfolio 1
    |
    |----Portfolio class 1
    |            |
    |            |----Portfolio class 1.1
    |            |             |
    |            |             |----Portfolio class 1.1.1
    |            |
    |            |----Portfolio class 1.2
    |
    |----Portfolio class 2
                 |
                 |----Portfolio class 2.1
      Specified by:
      getPortfolioStructure in interface IPortfolioQueryService
      Parameters:
      id - the portfolio id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the portfolio structure, if the portfolio exists; an empty Optional otherwise;
